context_bundle.summary: AutoHotkey v2 automation for Windows. EXECUTABLE: C:\Program Files\AHK\v2\AutoHotkey64.exe. SCRIPTS FOLDER: X:\AHK  SCRIPTS\ (TWO SPACES between AHK and SCRIPTS - see E54PATH). 156+ scripts available for UI control, window management, keyboard/mouse simulation.

onboarding.quick_start:
RUN SCRIPT: & 'C:\Program Files\AHK\v2\AutoHotkey64.exe' 'X:\AHK  SCRIPTS\scriptname.ahk'
LIST SCRIPTS: Get-ChildItem 'X:\AHK  SCRIPTS\*.ahk' | Select Name
KEY SCRIPTS: copy_response.ahk, CLAUDE_EYES.ahk, AIMessaging.ahk, common.ahk, VocalClaudes.ahk
common_patterns: RUN WITH ARGS: & 'C:\Program Files\AHK\v2\AutoHotkey64.exe' 'X:\AHK  SCRIPTS\script.ahk' arg1 arg2

known_errors.cause: Path has wrong number of spaces
known_errors.solution: Use TWO SPACES: X:\AHK  SCRIPTS\ not X:\AHK SCRIPTS\
known_errors.prevention: Always copy path exactly from door

known_errors.cause: Window title changed or not visible
known_errors.solution: Use WinWait with timeout, check window exists
known_errors.prevention: Use partial window matching with SetTitleMatchMode
